transcript: It'll get better. I know it doesn't help, but it will get better. And you will remember all of the good things that you guys had, all of the memories that you have with him that were happy and you'll be grateful for those.

segments.text: I know it doesn't help, but it will get better.
And you will remember all of the good things that you guys had, all of the memories that
you have with him that were happy and you'll be grateful for those.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: It'll get better.  I know it doesn't help, but it will get better and you will remember all of the good things that you guys had; all of the memories that you have with him that were happy and you'll be grateful for those.
